longBusinessSummary: ADGS Advisory, Inc., through its subsidiaries, provides accounting, taxation, company secretarial, general corporate, and consultancy services in Hong Kong. The company operates in Accounting and Corporate Services, Corporate Restructuring and Insolvency, and Multi-Disciplinary Advisory segments. The Accounting and Corporate Services segment offers accounting, corporate, and tax advisory services. The Corporate Restructuring and Insolvency segment provides company winding-up services, including voluntary winding-up and compulsory winding-up services; and personal bankruptcy, restructuring, lender, creditors' rights, monitoring, receivership, and turnaround management services. The Multi-Disciplinary Advisory segment offers forensic and litigation advisory services, such as quantifying damages and providing independent expert opinion in various dispute situations relating to intellectual property, breach of contract, insurance claims, asset recovery, and fraud/criminal investigations; employing forensic accounting and complex modeling methods to provide insight on the facts and offer clarity on complex financial transactions; independently tracing, gathering, and analyzing critical information; and providing electronic evidence services that identify, preserve, and collect relevant structured information and analyze complex data. This segment also offers engineering and quantity surveying services. The company also owns residential property located in Tuen Mun, New Territories. It serves individuals, small and medium sized businesses, and charitable organizations. ADGS Advisory, Inc. is based in Kwun Tong, Hong Kong.
